title: Urgot Before and After
body: Can we get a before and after picture for Urgot, similar to what Sion got? I'd really like to see how Urgot looked like before his augmentations. It would be really cool. Please Riot, pleeeaaase.

replies.body:
Hey MisterGuy, unfortunately there's no official "before" art for Urgot. We spent 95% of our time figuring out who he is and should be in game. And the other 5%... well, that was spent listening to industrial metal music. No time left for anything else.

Maybe unofficial art will crop up at some point, though? 

Until then, maybe you could check out some of the early Urgot concepts, if you haven't already. Victor, aka 3rdColossus, did a lot of explorations of who Urgot could be, some more on the "before" side (focusing on the human/man), some frighteningly not. The Tick ftw!

https://www.artstation.com/artwork/kdWNK
Hey Interlocutioner, just wanted to say GL on creating an awesome narrative for my boy {{champion:50}}, i think you nailed Urgot so hoping the same for everyone's favorite birb
Thanks Spideraxe! No pressure, right? (gulp)

Just wanted to say I'm really starting to like the lore direction we saw with same in the Roadmap, I have feeling that Swain is on a path to success with the direction you chose along with 3rdColossus, Earp and BravoRay working on art and Herlache on kit
Ha, thanks again. There's a lot of work left to do... but we always aim to surprise and delight. {{sticker:leblanc-funny}}
Can't wait, give JohnOdyin a run for his money as the top champ up writer

We're all just Champions writers now, and can work on either VGUs or new champs. :D So I have to compete with FauxSchizzle, CoolRadius, WAAARGHbobo, and a few others too.

Not that it's a competition. But this is my personal theme song. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a07dDvHqsNw
Backstab CoolRadius after filling in for him at the Kayn AMA {{item:3147}} {{item:3142}}
I can't backstab, my class is Wizard, lol
Hold up. Who's in charge of Swain's gameplay?
Jonathan "20thCenturyFaux" Herlache, reworker of Leblanc, Brand, Zyra, Zilean and I think(?) Shaco and Kha'Zix
Give JohnOdyin a run for his money as the best champ up writer
out of curiosity i wish to learn of this....industrial metal.

Hmm, well, one thing I can tell you is that Author & Punisher was definitely on the playlist. :D

[(Relevant link!)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=72xrS-ezmA4)

Protoshredanoid actually worked with A&P on some of the sounds for Urgot's theme.

[(Relevant link, part deux!!)](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/6phsnt/were_the_rioters_that_did_the_urgot_update_get/dkpxdbr/?st=j8z84h87&sh=4547e669)
as a big fan of the new urgot i shall dive into these and more than likely enjoy them.
Oh thanks man. I can't wait for swain rework.
Whoa now, I'm getting some ideas for my stories from this.

so perfect
